anms.main.stocks.description: Please provide some valid stock market symbol like:
anms.main.stocks.text1: Stock market example shows how to implement
anms.main.stocks.text4: Updating symbol query with different symbol will emit action which updates state with loading flag (reducer) and triggers effect for retrieving of selected stock.
anms.main.stocks.text5: Actions are debounced and every subsequent request will cancel previous one using
anms.main.stocks.text6: Success or error actions are emitted on request completion. Loading spinner is removed and stock info or error message is displayed.
